messages.content: Hi, Please talk to Sandeep 9005464412, from the team
I see you also run ads on the reels, and that is nice. But with a proper ad strategy and content strategy, You can get more leads through ads.

Things that I noticed

1. All the videos should have a proper reel cover with the title mentioned and very good branding.

2. All the latest videos that have been published about 'x' acre of land available should have an address written on them through the full reel because most people watch only 3â4 seconds of the reel, and if they get the address written on the first 5 seconds, it will be good for them to have a proper knowledge of the location.Â 

3. The logo and phone are also mentioned on the screen through the full video. This will help in branding and make it easy for the audience to get in touch because only a few people click on the username and then see all the details in the account's bio.
Yeah sure, let me share my portfolio first âºï¸

Thanks for reaching out. 

Do share your portfolio and some specific pointers on the scope of improvements we can do. 

Accordingly we can discuss further

Hy 1Acre.in

You focus on your content, I'll focus on your branding.

I'm a video editor and social media marketer, I'll help you get ahead of your compitition on Instagram.
